resources.title: Tidewave Web: in-browser coding agent for Rails and Phoenix
resources.description: Announcement detailing Tidewave Web’s model-aware, in-browser agent that integrates with Phoenix and Rails for full-stack changes.

resources.title: Thinking Elixir 267 — Dive into Tidewave Web with José Valim
resources.description: Interview and deep dive into Tidewave’s goals, architecture, and developer workflow inside Phoenix.

resources.title: Thinking Elixir 267 — Dive into Tidewave Web (YouTube)
resources.description: Video version of the episode covering Tidewave’s in-browser agent and Phoenix integration.

resources.title: The path to Tidewave: beyond code intelligence
resources.description: Dashbit article outlining the vision that led to Tidewave and how it moves from code understanding to system understanding.

resources.title: Tidewave Web: in-browser coding agent for Phoenix (community discussion)
resources.description: Elixir Forum thread announcing and discussing Tidewave’s Phoenix integration, with community feedback.
